text: Keith Allen may refer to: *Keith Allen (actor) (born 1953), British actor *Keith Allen (footballer) (born 1943), English professional footballer *Keith Allen (ice hockey) (1923–2014), Canadian hockey player/coach/executive *Keith Allen (politician) (1931–1984), New Zealand MP *Keith Allen (American football) (born 1974), American football coach *Keith Allen (rugby union), Scottish rugby union referee
title: Keith Allen
